title: "A Major Gaze-Tracking Patent published last week was written by one of Apple's Mixed Reality, Computer Vision Superstars"
excerpt: "Last Thursday the US Patent & Trademark Office published a patent application from Apple that relates to assessing characteristics of pupils of eyes, and in particular, to systems, methods, and devices for assessing pupil characteristics using light reflected off the eyes to estimate the user's gaze direction using multiple glints to identify the user's eye shape,"
